snippet: The firing of Anatoly E. Serdyukov, a longtime Putin ally, is one of the highest-level dismissals connected to a corruption case in recent memory in Russia.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin fires Defense Min Anatoly E Serdyukov, allegedly to allow police to continue their investigation into corruption allegations against Defense Ministry, though analysts suggest that other political motives may be at play.
lead_paragraph: The firing of Anatoly E. Serdyukov, a longtime Putin ally, is one of the highest-level dismissals connected to a corruption case in recent memory in Russia.

headline.seo: Putin Fires Defense Minister Linked to Real Estate Investigation
headline.main: Putin Ousts Defense Chief, Longtime Ally
headline.print_headline: Putin Ousts Defense Chief, Longtime Ally
